metadata.name: Account Created And Deleted Within A Close Time Frame
metadata.comment: Detects when an account was created and deleted in a short period of time.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((lower(LOWER(message)) in ('add user', 'delete user')) AND lower(status_code) = lower('success'))

output.summary: Detects when an account was created and deleted in a short period of time.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legit administrative action Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-user-accounts#short-lived-accounts
